alert.note: Alert for Defiance; Henry (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 28 at 3:04PM EST until March 02 at 2:30PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Ohio... Maumee River near Defiance affecting Defiance and Henry Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Ohio... Indiana... Saint Joseph River Ohio below Montpelier affecting Williams County. Saint Joseph River Ohio near St. Joe River Ft. Wayne affecting Allen IN County. Saint Joseph River Ohio near Newville affecting Defiance, Allen IN and De Kalb Counties. Tiffin River at Stryker affecting Defiance, Williams and Fulton OH Counties. North Branch Elkhart River at Cosperville affecting Noble County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Maumee River near Defiance. * WHEN...Until early Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 12.3 feet, Flooding begins on Auglaize and East Front Streets and in the rear of the building at Leever Glass. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 11.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:15 PM EST Tuesday was 11.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 11.3 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Never drive vehicles through flooded areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or local media for further statements and updated forecasts. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
